title: What irl/ip should i unblock?
body: Recently my school agreed to unblock certain games after school so people in my club could play them together. they have a system which automatically blocked games and they wanted to know what irl/ip's they would need to unblock so league can run properly. I tried googling anf nothing came up. Any help?

replies.body: We use 104.160.131.1 for NA servers, which can be an addition.  There may be other obstacles, however, while your network reaches our Riot Direct nodes to zoom towards our game servers.  You or the IT admins may want to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out with this and get you set up.  Hope that helps!
